nodes.text: The Nezni system was an Outer Rim system located in the Mayagil Sector. An incident between the pirate group, Hurrim and the Rebel Alliance occurred here, after the Hurrim started attacking the Imperial citizens that the combined forces were scavenging.
The Y-Wings from Green Squadron sent by the MC80 cruiser Liberty eventually destroyed all the Preybird fighters of the Hurrim and regained control of the situation.
It housed Golan Space Colony 1 Corvalis and XQ4 Platform Henlon Station.
